COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa
STRING: It was difficult to ask pleasantly to be woken up in the
morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106
STRING: After I read the letter, Phorni appeared before me once,
but then disappeared right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c
STRING: Without asking me for an “ensemble” or scolding me for
being “indecisive.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x132
STRING: She said only one thing, “That's good,” and disappeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, good morning. Did you call me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a2
STRING: [Chris] “Call you...? Not really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4
STRING: [Phorni] “What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea
STRING: [Chris] “You disappeared suddenly without saying
anything yesterday...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200
STRING: I was feeling that she didn't appear even when I called
her, and was inwardly surprised as I asked her about
yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x232
STRING: [Phorni] “It wasn't sudden. I said it was good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252
STRING: [Chris] “That's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x284
STRING: [Phorni] “I thought you wanted to be left alone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a
STRING: [Chris] “Didn't you want to do our ensemble? You never
usually leave me alone about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d6
STRING: [Phorni] “But it's not necessary anymore, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ec
STRING: [Chris] “Necessary...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31e
STRING: [Phorni] “You need energy for your practice with Torta
now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e
STRING: [Chris] “So you... You performed an ensemble with me
because it was necessary, Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37a
STRING: [Phorni] “No... I wanted to. That's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x390
STRING: [Chris] “Then what's the lie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c2
STRING: [Phorni] “I just, wanted to sing a little more.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d8
STRING: [Chris] “Then you could just sing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40a
STRING: [Phorni] “How many days do you think are left until the
graduation recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x420
STRING: [Chris] “You sound like Torta again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x452
STRING: [Phorni] “You have to treat time preciously. You have to
spend as much time with Torta as you can now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x472
STRING: [Chris] “Why do I have to hear that from you, Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ae
STRING: [Phorni] “I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c4
STRING: Phorni continued in a more adult tone than usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d8
STRING: [Phorni] “I can't be with you anymore, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ee
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x520
STRING: [Phorni] “You're going to leave here when you graduate,
right? I... I'm staying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x540
STRING: [Chris] “Would you come with me if I asked you to?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x572
STRING: [Phorni] “That's impossible... I can't leave this place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x592
STRING: [Chris] “But you've been outside lots of times. Can't I
just bring you with me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ce
STRING: [Phorni] “You can't say that to other girls, okay?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fc
STRING: I'll be mad if you make Torta cry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x612
STRING: [Chris] “I won't... I only said it because it's you, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x630
STRING: [Phorni] “That's no good either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65e
STRING: I'm a girl too after all. I'd like it if you didn't invite me so
lightly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x674
STRING: [Chris] “Dummy...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a6
STRING: [Phorni] “Who is?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6bc
STRING: [Chris] “Both of us... But is it true you can't leave this
place?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f8
STRING: [Phorni] “It's true. Do you think I'd lie about that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70e
STRING: [Chris] “I wonder... I feel like you might.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x740
STRING: [Phorni] “You dummy. It's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x756
STRING: [Chris] “But nobody noticed you until I got here, did
they Phorni? What are you going to do now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x792
STRING: [Phorni] “Well... I guess I'll wait until someone comes?
Or if no one comes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b2
STRING: [Chris] “If no one comes...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e4
STRING: [Phorni] “If nobody senses me, I suppose I won't exist
anymore.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x804
STRING: [Chris] “That's ridiculous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x822
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm just making assumptions, but it's okay. I'm
here alone, it wouldn't be strange if there was someone
else.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x842
STRING: [Chris] “But why is it only this apartment?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x874
STRING: [Phorni] “Because this is where students from the
Communal Music School live. And because I'm a musical
fairy. It's fine. You just think about yourself, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89e
STRING: [Chris] “I can't... I mean, Phorni you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d0
STRING: [Phorni] “Phorni...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e6
STRING: [Chris] “To me, you're...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fc
STRING: What was she?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x908
STRING: [Chris] “I can't... I can't find the words. You're just
important to me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x928
STRING: Like a sister? Or a close friend?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x934
STRING: Neither of those words seemed quite right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x940
STRING: But if you asked me if she was my girlfriend, it was clear
that wasn't the case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x956
STRING: If I didn't have Arie or Torta...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x962
STRING: Assumptions like that didn't mean anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x96e
STRING: Even more meaningless than what Phorni was talking
about before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x996
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah-ha-ha. It's fine like that. I'm just me. I
wouldn't want to be called just your friend, so it's fine
like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b6
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e8
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, that's too much talk for the morning. If
you don't go to practice soon, Torta will be mad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa08
STRING: [Chris] “Right... I don't know how much time I'll have,
but let's perform our ensemble when I get home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa44
STRING: [Phorni] “That's the opposite of always.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5a
STRING: [Chris] “Do you not like it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8c
STRING: [Phorni] “I don't mind. I'll be waiting, then. Will you be
back late?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa2
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe a little... I want to talk to Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad4
STRING: [Phorni] “Good boy. If you came here without talking to
Torta, I thought I'd give you a spanking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf4
STRING: [Chris] “Shut up...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb12
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah-ha-ha. Now Chris says it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb28
STRING: [Chris] “I'm leaving today, if I call you when I get home,
will you appear?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb64
STRING: [Phorni] “Appear... I guess there's no other way to say it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7a
STRING: [Chris] “That's right. Okay, I'm off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbac
STRING: [Phorni] “Yeah, have a good day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbdc
STRING: I was able to really talk to Phorni, so I felt a little
refreshed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf2
STRING: I realized that I hadn't been able to talk to her about
leaving her or anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc08
STRING: That may have been one of the reasons that it didn't
feel real, but I still couldn't imagine living here without
Phorni around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc28
STRING: If Phorni hadn't brought up our parting, I probably still
wouldn't have thought about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3e
STRING: When I thought about the fact that I only had a short
time left with Phorni, I felt strangely lonely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc54
STRING: I hoped that I could at least enjoy the remaining time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc9e
STRING: To keep my promise to Torta, I stopped by Ms. Cordell's
classroom before I went to the practice room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb4
STRING: Phorni had hurried me along, but when I arrived it was
only 10:15.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcca
STRING: Torta was probably already in the practice room, but I
still wasn't late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3c
STRING: [Cordell] “Hmm? Oh, good morning, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd52
STRING: [Chris] “Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd70
STRING: [Cordell] “Do you want to talk about something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd86
STRING: [Chris] “I was hoping you would watch our practice
again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb8
STRING: [Cordell] “I see, that's good dedication. I'm free this
afternoon; what do you want to do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd8
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, this afternoon. That's fine, of course. Are
you busy right now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe14
STRING: [Cordell] “The other student that I'm always worried
about is coming.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe34
STRING: [Chris] “Is it Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe66
STRING: [Cordell] “Yeah. It seems he finally found a partner. Did
you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe86
STRING: [Chris] “Well, Torta... Tortinita told me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb8
STRING: [Cordell] “I see. I was surprised, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xece
STRING: [Chris] “Was it a cute first-year student?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeec
STRING: [Cordell] “Yeah. They're coming here together. There's
almost no time. It's only until noon today, but I'm going
to use the time to the fullest. That poor first year.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf16
STRING: [Chris] “Ngh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2c
STRING: If Ms. Cordell said that, it really would be hard for the
first year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf54
STRING: [Cordell] “They should be here soon, do you want to
see?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6a
STRING: [Chris] “No. I'll hold my excitement until the recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9c
STRING: [Cordell] “Yeah, do that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc0
STRING: Ms. Cordell looked like she was enjoying herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfee
STRING: When I entered the practice room, Torta was there as I
thought, and was ready to go.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1020
STRING: [Torta] “Ah, morning. You just made it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1036
STRING: [Chris] “Morning. I'm not late, I went to see Ms. Cordell.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1072
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, I see... Thanks. So? Will she come watch
us?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1092
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, in the afternoon. Until then... I guess we'll
practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ce
STRING: [Torta] “Of course. We have to work hard.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e4
STRING: [Chris] “I know that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113c
STRING: Our morning practice was finished, and we had eaten.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1148
STRING: We just had to go to the classroom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1170
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1186
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. This will probably be the last time she can
watch us.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a4
STRING: [Torta] “She'll probably be really busy too, starting
tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ba
STRING: [Chris] “The same goes for the recital, but we can't take
it easy today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d0
STRING: Torta and I nodded to each other, and went to see Ms.
Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1206
STRING: [Chris] “Excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1246
STRING: We said this together as we entered; two students
were still in the middle of practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125c
STRING: Upon entering the room, their performance stopped.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Is it still too early?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a4
STRING: [Cordell] “Chris, sorry. We're not done yet. You're not
early, so don't worry. Regardless, we've been going
without a break. It's Asino's fault.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ea
STRING: [Asino] “I... I said I was sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131c
STRING: [Cordell] “It's fine. That's all for today. Are you both free
all day tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1344
STRING: [Asino] “Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135a
STRING: [Schoolboy] “Y-Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1378
STRING: [Cordell] “Good. It so happens I'm free, too. You can
come in the morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b4
STRING: [Asino] “In the morning...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d2
STRING: [Cordell] “How many times do I have to say it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1404
STRING: [Asino] “Understood...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x141a
STRING: [Chris] “It looks like you're working hard, Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144c
STRING: [Asino] “Shut up. Oh, can you go on ahead? I'll meet you
in the practice room.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146c
STRING: Asino said this to the innocent-looking young male
student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1478
STRING: [Schoolboy] “Oh, yes. I'll be waiting, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1498
STRING: [Chris] “Ms. Cordell is going to watch us practice now...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d4
STRING: [Asino] “I'm sure she'll take a break before that. She
didn't have a lunch break.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1510
STRING: [Cordell] “Thank you for the kind words. If you hadn't
been the reason for that, I would've been touched.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154c
STRING: [Asino] “Sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x157e
STRING: [Cordell] “It is fine. I'll not drag it out, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x159e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, but we're fine. Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15de
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, right. We don't mind waiting an hour. We'll
just stay and practice anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1628
STRING: [Cordell] “So it seems. Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x165a
STRING: [Asino] “I'll be sticking around to practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168c
STRING: [Cordell] “I know. Be thankful to your friends. In that
case, I suppose I'll take you up on your offer. You can
use the room as you please until I get back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16cc
STRING: Ms. Cordell flashed a smile that showed nothing of how
busy she was, and went outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fc
STRING: Asino looked at me and shrugged as if he was
ashamed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1712
STRING: [Chris] “She said be thankful.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1744
STRING: [Asino] “I just got you an extra hour. You should thank
me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1780
STRING: [Torta] “My hero. We could play whenever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17aa
STRING: [Chris] “That's right, but that was unexpected. You have
strange tastes, Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e6
STRING: [Asino] “Shut up. He's my friend's little brother. I actually
wanted a girl.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1806
STRING: [Chris] “Then why didn't you get a girl?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1838
STRING: [Asino] “There are some circumstances.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184e
STRING: [Chris] “You're staying away from girls?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1880
STRING: [Asino] “Tortinita...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b2
STRING: [Torta] “It came up in conversation. I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18d0
STRING: [Asino] “What conversation?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1902
STRING: [Torta] “Oh shut up. Have some sympathy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1934
STRING: [Asino] “Look, Chris. This is Tortinita's true nature. You're
being deceived.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1954
STRING: [Chris] “I've known that for a long time...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1986
STRING: [Torta] “What did you say...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x199c
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't actually seen it in a while, but you
were like that when we were kids. Well, that's just like
you Torta, so it's fine, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e2
STRING: [Asino] “＊sigh＊ I don't want to be uncouth. I guess
love is blind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0c
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a22
STRING: [Chris] “That's not it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a54
STRING: [Asino] “Hmm... You two are sure in synch.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6a
STRING: [Chris] “I said that's not it...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a9c
STRING: [Asino] “Are you denying it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ab2
STRING: [Chris] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af4
STRING: [Asino] “You really are cute, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b1e
STRING: [Chris] “Shut up. Can't you just go practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b3c
STRING: [Asino] “I really should, what with another session with
Ms. Cordell looming tomorrow. Anyway, I'm happy for
you, Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b7a
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba6
STRING: Asino left looking very happy for some reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb2
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be4
STRING: [Torta] “What...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bfa
STRING: [Chris] “You're friendlier with Asino than I thought.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2c
STRING: [Torta] “Is that how it looks?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c42
STRING: [Chris] “It did. People don't normally say they're happy
for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c60
STRING: [Torta] “He was just teasing me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c76
STRING: [Chris] “Well... If you say so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca8
STRING: [Torta] “Come on, let's not waste time talking. Let's
practice until she gets back. We already had a lunch
break, so we should practice a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah. I won't resist.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cfa
STRING: [Torta] “Good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d1e
STRING: It had been a while since we'd talked like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2a
STRING: Of course, I was always with Torta, so we had plenty of
amiable conversations.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d40
STRING: But it really had been a while since I'd had a dumb and
fun conversation, even with Asino.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d56
STRING: It might have only been a few times since I'd come to
the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6c
STRING: I felt like that kind of thing happened naturally every
day when I was a child.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d82
STRING: I started getting my Fortelle ready as I watched Torta
prepare her sheet music from the corner of my eye.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc0
STRING: Ms. Cordell came back before thirty minutes had
passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1df2
STRING: [Cordell] “Sorry to keep you waiting. It looks like you're
ready.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e08
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. We're ready whenever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e3a
STRING: [Cordell] “You have plenty of confidence.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e50
STRING: [Chris] “Well... Some I suppose.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e82
STRING: [Torta] “Hey... Say that with more confidence.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e98
STRING: [Chris] “I'm fine... Leave it to me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eb6
STRING: [Cordell] “Fine then. Now, let's begin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee8
STRING: [Torta] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f48
STRING: We played over and over again until Ms. Cordell was
satisfied.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f9e
STRING: I felt that we were getting very close to Torta's dream
of the best performance possible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fba
STRING: Torta's dream of the best performance possible was still
far away, but making it a reality was our goal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fd0
STRING: As we played over and over, we stopped making
mistakes, and we somehow managed to satisfy Ms.
Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2014
STRING: [Cordell] “Okay, that's enough.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202a
STRING: The next thing I knew, it had become dark outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2036
STRING: Both out of breath, we replied, “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2054
STRING: [Cordell] “Hmm. I suppose that's a pass.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206a
STRING: [Chris] “That's strict...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2088
STRING: [Cordell] “You'll thank me for that strictness later, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x209e
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊ Good. I don't know what I would have
done if you'd said I still wasn't cutting it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c6
STRING: [Cordell] “I'm sure you both know best how well you
just performed. I won't say anything more. Decide for
yourselves and do your best at the recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20f0
STRING: [Chris] “Yes... Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2122
STRING: [Torta] “Thank you very much!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2140
STRING: [Cordell] “The both of you... No, I'll tell you afterward. I
wouldn't want you worrying about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2160
STRING: [Chris] “That just makes me interested. But you made
me interested in a good way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x219c
STRING: [Cordell] “Hee hee. Well, that's how it is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21b2
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. So, until the recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21d0
STRING: [Cordell] “I'm personally excited about it. Of course for
Asino, too. It will be too bad to lose the excitement
about the recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21f0
STRING: [Chris] “I'm excited for the music at the recital. Is the
program already decided?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222c
STRING: [Cordell] “It's posted on the school bulletin board. Didn't
you know either, Tortinita?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2268
STRING: [Torta] “No, I thought Chris knew.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ae
STRING: [Cordell] “That's no good... Chris is on first in the
afternoon. Asino is on last in the afternoon. Meaning
he's the last of the day. Your performance will already
be over, so you'll be able to relax.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e0
STRING: [Torta] “So our last practice will be during the lunch
break.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f6
STRING: [Chris] “Please don't talk about that now...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2328
STRING: [Cordell] “Are you tired? Practice in moderation until the
recital. Though I don't mind if you wake up early to
practice on the day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2352
STRING: [Chris] “Stop that... Torta will take it seriously.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2370
STRING: [Cordell] “I was saying it seriously.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23a2
STRING: [Torta] “See, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23b8
STRING: [Chris] “Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ea
STRING: [Torta] “The morning of the recital... At ten o'clock.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2400
STRING: [Chris] “Is that okay...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2432
STRING: [Torta] “Well, that depends on how well we do the day
before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2448
STRING: [Chris] “Then, I'll do my best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x247a
STRING: [Cordell] “Hee hee. I'm looking forward to it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24cc
STRING: Many things had happened since that morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24d8
STRING: Ms. Cordell's special practice was harder than I thought
it would be.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e4
STRING: I felt for Asino, having to do it all day the next day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24f0
STRING: Anyway, I was able to talk to many people.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24fc
STRING: Perhaps I should say all the people who helped me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2508
STRING: It was only three people, one of whom was a fairy, but
all of them meant a lot to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2528
STRING: And the most important person was right next to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2534
STRING: [Chris] “Torta... Are you cold?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2566
STRING: [Torta] “What, are you being a gentleman? It doesn't
suit you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x257c
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊ Asino is the same, but why do you take
people's kindness that way?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25b8
STRING: [Torta] “Because you said something you wouldn't
normally say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ce
STRING: [Chris] “That's because I can no longer treat you in a
normal way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x260a
STRING: [Torta] “You can't...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2620
STRING: [Chris] “Well, no.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264a
STRING: Torta must have realized the reason; she suddenly
blushed and cast her eyes down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2660
STRING: Her feelings changed in an instant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x266c
STRING: Maybe she remembered what Asino said, and Arie's
letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2682
STRING: [Chris] “Torta, there's something I want to talk to you
about today... Okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26aa
STRING: [Torta] “S-Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c0
STRING: The piazza was very close.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26cc
STRING: We didn't need to talk about it at home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26d8
STRING: Torta didn't seem very cold either, so it would be alright
if it took a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2710
STRING: We sat down on the rim of the fountain and talked
about the future.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x271c
STRING: Torta's face was still nervous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2728
STRING: [Chris] “Arie's letter came yesterday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x275a
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2770
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, did one come for you, too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x278e
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a4
STRING: [Chris] “Then I don't have to tell you what it said?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c2
STRING: [Torta] “Maybe...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27d8
STRING: That was the problem in progressing the current
conversation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ee
STRING: I got a break-up letter from Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27fa
STRING: But, that didn't mean I could just start with Torta... I
thought that would be a bit much.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2810
STRING: Even if I had liked Torta the whole time, I had also liked
Arie until now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2826
STRING: No, I still liked her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2832
STRING: We had just broken up, so I couldn't change my feelings
so fast.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2848
STRING: So I decided to tell her how I honestly felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2854
STRING: [Chris] “Arie wrote she was breaking up with me. I think
she probably wrote something similar to you, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2886
STRING: [Torta] “Y-Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x289c
STRING: [Chris] “About that... I accepted it. Because of what Arie
said, and because I realized how I really feel.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e2
STRING: [Torta] “How... How you really feel?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28f8
STRING: [Chris] “I like you, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2922
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2938
STRING: [Chris] “I know this isn't the right time to say this kind of
thing. I know that saying it right after my break up is the
worst.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2962
STRING: [Chris] “But, with what happened before... I just wanted
to say it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x298a
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a0
STRING: [Chris] “So I'm not asking what you want me to do or
anything. I just wanted to tell you that I like you, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29e6
STRING: [Torta] “Is that enough for you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29fc
STRING: [Chris] “It's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a1a
STRING: [Torta] “Even though I said I liked you, too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a30
STRING: [Chris] “It was a different situation then. Arie was still my
girlfriend, and I'm sure you just wanted to tell me too,
Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a5a
STRING: [Chris] “Let's talk again at the graduation recital. You
can ask me for an answer then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a96
STRING: [Torta] “Hey... Do you still have feelings for Arie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aac
STRING: [Chris] “If I'm being honest... A little. I can't stop liking
her right away.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ae8
STRING: [Torta] “No, you don't have to stop liking her. Just... If
you like me most... That's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b08
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b3a
STRING: [Torta] “But let's just leave it all until after the
graduation recital is over. Now we just have to work
hard to give a good performance. It won't be too late
then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b64
STRING: [Chris] “You're right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b96
STRING: [Torta] “So, I guess we'll practice hard again from
tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bac
STRING: [Chris] “The only saving grace is that there's only three
days left.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bde
STRING: [Torta] “Two days. Thursday is the day before, so we
should rest up a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bfe
STRING: [Chris] “I guess Ms. Cordell did say that. That's good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c26
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, we should go home. It's a little late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c3c
STRING: [Chris] “Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c52
STRING: We stood up and walked toward the Old District.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c84
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? The calzone guy isn't here today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ca4
STRING: [Chris] “Ah-ha-ha. It's late at night. Did you come back
after Natale?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cd6
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, yeah. Just once.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cec
STRING: [Chris] “Did you listen to the old man play the
accordion?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d0a
STRING: [Torta] “Uh-uh, not yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d20
STRING: [Chris] “I want to hear it one time. Before I leave here.
He seems nice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d5c
STRING: [Torta] “How about the Sunday after the recital? Do you
want to walk around town?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d7c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, that'd be nice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dc4
STRING: I didn't think the day would come that we would be
able to talk so naturally after it was over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dda
STRING: As always, I couldn't think about what would happen
after I left the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de6
STRING: But it was at least likely that I'd be with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dfc
STRING: However... I just couldn't try to be with her right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e12
STRING: I felt guilty toward Arietta, and felt it would be unkind
to Tortinita.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e28
STRING: Even if Torta asked me herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e34
STRING: It seemed that Torta understood this immediately.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e40
STRING: For the moment, I would just think of Torta as the one I
liked the most, and about succeeding at the graduation
recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e56
STRING: I could think about what came after when the time
came.
